mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_TITLE, POSTER, PRODUCER, RATING, RELEASE_DATE, RUNNING_TIME, SYNOPSIS, NVL(RATIO_TO_REPORT(TICKET_COUNT) OVER(),0) AS RATIO, NVL(MAIN_POSTER, 'null') MAIN_POSTER FROM(SELECT MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_TITLE, POSTER, PRODUCER, RATING, RELEASE_DATE, RUNNING_TIME, SYNOPSIS, (SELECT COUNT(TICKET_NO) FROM TICKETING_INFO C WHERE P.MOVIE_NO = C.MOVIE_NO) TICKET_COUNT, MAIN_POSTER FROM MOVIE P WHERE SCREENING = 'Y' ORDER BY TICKET_COUNT DESC, RELEASE_DATE)

SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - NOTICE_ENROLL_DATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - NOTICE_ENROLL_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - NOTICE_ENROLL_DATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - NOTICE_ENROLL_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - NOTICE_ENROLL_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - NOTICE_ENROLL_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(NOTICE_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END NOTICE_ENROLL_DATE,
NOTICE_VIEWPOINT FROM (SELECT * FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_ENROLL_DATE DESC)
WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
